tafsirQuiz.question: Which concept is emphasized in Surah Az-Zukhruf, Ayah 1?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: These sublime scriptures, being full of wisdom, are in themselves proof of their being the Book of God. The language of the Quran and its contents do justice to the Majesty of God with the utmost exactitude
